name: Blue Dots Challenge
description:
~ BLUE DOTS REVENGE ~

a tiny virtual toy made by Ludovic Moge in one hour

DESCRIPTION :
Theme of the week was "Less is more" so I Tried to make a game when you can duplicate some blue dots and some force to them.
Right now, it seems more like a "More is more" kind of game but so what :D

INPUTS  :
WASD/Arrow Keys : Move Camera
Left Click : Duplicate dot. Hold and release to apply an impulse force to the dot in the opposite direction between your cursor and the dot
(like a slingshot kind of thing)

CREDITS  :
Farland Skies - Simple Cumulus by Borodar http://www.borodar.com/
